title: Permit not an inducement
context: ยง431:4-112 Permit not an inducement. The granting of a solicitation permit is permissive only and shall not constitute an endorsement by the commissioner of any person or thing related to the proposed insurer or corporation. The existence of the permit shall not be advertised or used as an inducement in any solicitation. The substance of this section in boldfaced type not less than ten point shall be printed at the top of each solicitation permit. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
